mods.abstract: An exterior view of Robertson Academy, circa July 1981. The inscription from the historic marker states that the school “was established by an Act of Tennessee General Assembly Sept. 13, 1806, which provided for an academy in each of the then 27 counties. The school has operated continuously since that time.” This school is located at Robertson Academy Road, south of Harding Place, approximately 7 miles south of Nashville. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
